body:
This is not a Radiance-specific post, but an interesting little app  
that I came across - as a lot of us model things in 3D, I thought the  
PC (XP to be exact) users among us might give it a whirl and let us  
Mac users know how cool this is.


http://ogle.eyebeamresearch.org/


The app logs the 3D data passed through the OpenGL DLL and "captures"  
the 3D data, essentially creating a 3D screen grab of any OpenGL 3D  
object you may come across.  It appears that you can then import the  
object into a 3D app like Maya and proceed as usual.


kirk
